item.title: Will Rep++ if you help with donorzone!
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

koala sex:

Pi umm i think its a bit hybrip and a bit xxdestructionxx somewhere around them lines

instead of case 108003: if (c.isDonator == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(4, 27620); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be an donator to view this tab!"); return; } break;
try this:

case 108003:
            if (c.isDonator == 0) {
            c.sendMessage("You must be an donator to view this tab!");
            return;
            } else {
            c.setSidebarInterface(4, 27620);          
            }
            break;

If that works you’re welcome.
(If it doesn’t let me know)

Read full topic
item.source: Will Rep++ if you help with donorzone!

case 108003:
if (c.isDonator == 1) {
c.setSidebarInterface(4, 27620);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You must be an donator to view this tab!”);
return;
}
break;

please help i will repp u can tv me if u wish![/quote]

what base u have?
